description: Pack 2 guaranteed cards - Second major deck upgrade (~15-20 minutes, 100,000 Essence). Introduces sequence tracking and timing-based conditionals. Adds generator variety and hybrid options. This is the AUTHORITATIVE SOURCE for Pack 2 card stats and effects.

cards.name: Arcane Reservoir
cards.flavor_text: Store your magic for the right moment, and let it shield you when you release it.
cards._design_notes: First burst generator with combat stats. Defensive focus. Not strictly better than Essence Burst (+250 pure burst) or Combat Siphon (+1/sec, +12/6 balanced). Unique niche: defensive burst hybrid.

cards.name: Steady Channeling
cards.flavor_text: Pure essence flow requires absolute focus. Defensive posture interferes with the channel.
cards._design_notes: Completes penalty generator set with Essence Drain. Essence Drain has -5 ATK (offensive penalty), Steady Channeling has -3 DEF (defensive penalty). Gives choice of which penalty to accept. Same rate as Essence Drain.

cards.name: Offensive Siphon
cards.flavor_text: Channel your aggression into essence. Every strike fuels your magic.
cards._design_notes: Attack-focused hybrid generator. Not strictly better than Combat Siphon (+1/sec, +12/6 = 18 total combat) or Arcane Conduit (+2/sec no combat). Pure offense focus, same rate as Combat Siphon but unbalanced stats.

cards.name: Arcane Synergy
cards.ability_text: +15 ATK, +10 DEF, +1 Essence/sec. If previous card was Generator: +10 ATK, +10 DEF
cards.flavor_text: Magic begets magic. Build momentum with each spell, and channel the overflow into power.
cards._design_notes: FIRST SEQUENCE-TRACKING CARD IN GAME. Teaches 'previous card' mechanic. Rewards generator-heavy decks (30-40% generators = ~35% trigger rate). When triggered: 25/20/1 total. Coefficient 0.4 per conditional-mechanics.md (Sometimes True, depends on deck composition).

cards.name: Battle Focus
cards.ability_text: +20 ATK, +15 DEF. After 2nd reshuffle: +15 ATK, +10 DEF
cards.flavor_text: The longer the battle, the sharper your mind. By the third cycle, you've found every advantage.
cards._design_notes: Teaches reshuffle timing (different from state-based conditions). Rewards longer fights (Enemy 50+ reach 2nd reshuffle naturally). Short fights: 20/15. Long fights: 35/25 total. Coefficient 0.5 per conditional-mechanics.md (Often True in non-trivial fights).
